thread.title: Apple patent application reveals iPhone inductive charging sans extra hardware
thread.title_full: Apple patent application reveals iPhone inductive charging sans extra hardware

title: Apple patent application reveals iPhone inductive charging sans extra hardware
text:
Apple patent application reveals iPhone inductive charging sans extra hardware 
Published By: MacDailyNews.com - Today 
According to a patent application published on Thursday, Apple is actively investigating the integration of inductive charging tech
